answers.author: Jennifer Kimball
answers.text:
The City of Rockville issued and RFP for an automated vehicle tracking system last spring.  A copy is attached.


The City of Rockville issued and RFP for an automated vehicle tracking system last spring.  A copy is attached.

answers.author: Andrea Curtis
answers.text:
Salt Lake City's Building Services department found that utilizing the GPS tracking options in employees' wireless phones was more effective.  Supervisors receive alerts when an employee leaves his/her designated area, exceeds posted speed limits, etc.  If you'd like more information, contact Orion Goff, Division Director, at 801-535-6681 or Craig Spangenberg, Zoning Enforcement Supervisor, at 801-535-7752.

author: Unknown
text:
The City of Richmond is looking for examples of RFP's (or content from RFP's) for the provision of GPS tracking/monitoring of municipal fleets.
Thanks!
title: GPS tracking/vehicle monitoring
